Class Loan

java.lang.Object
com.lms.library.model.Loan
public class Loan extends Object
Represents a loan transaction in the library system. Contains information about the member, loan dates, status, and items being borrowed.
Since:
2025
Version:
1.0
Author:
Joel Silva
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Loan

      public Loan()
      Default constructor for Loan. Required for serialization and dependency injection frameworks.

    • Loan

      public Loan(Member member, LocalDate loanDate, LocalDate expectedReturnDate)
      Constructs a new Loan with specified member and dates.
      Parameters:
      member - the member who is borrowing the items
      loanDate - the date when the loan is created
      expectedReturnDate - the expected return date for the items

      Gets the unique identifier of the loan.
      Returns:
      the loan ID

      Returns:
      the member entity

      Gets the date when the loan was created.
      Returns:

    • getItems

      public List<LoanItem> getItems()
      Gets the current status of the loan.
      Returns:
      the loan status

    • setId

      public void setId(Long id)
      Sets the unique identifier of the loan.
      Parameters:
      id - the new ID to set

    • addItem

      public void addItem(LoanItem item)
      Adds a loan item to this loan and establishes the bidirectional relationship.
      Parameters:
      item - the loan item to add

    • updateStatus

      public void updateStatus()
      Updates the loan status based on the return status of all items. If all items are returned, sets status to CLOSED; otherwise, sets to OPEN.
